traits.name: Local Knowledge
traits.description: Tom knows the local area well and can provide information about recent events, the goblin raids, and the missing merchant.

actions.name: Provide Information
actions.description: Tom can share what he knows about the goblin attacks and point adventurers toward the forest path where attacks have occurred.

personality.ideal: Community - The tavern is a gathering place that brings people together
personality.bond: This tavern has been in my family for three generations
personality.flaw: I'm a bit too trusting of strangers with coin
